quiz.question: _____ ditty
quiz.explanation: 小曲; 小调, 短小曲. She hummed a short ditty. 她哼着一首短小曲。

quiz.question: deputy _____
quiz.explanation: 代理人; 副职, 副市长. The deputy mayor attended the meeting. 副市长参加了会议。

quiz.question: ______ obloquy
quiz.explanation: 谩骂; 诽谤, 公众谩骂. He suffered public obloquy after the scandal. 丑闻后他遭受了公众谩骂。

quiz.question: ___________ colloquy
quiz.explanation: 对话; 会谈, 哲学对话. They engaged in a philosophic colloquy. 他们进行了哲学对话。

quiz.question: levy _ ___
quiz.explanation: 征收; 征税, 征税. The government will levy a tax on imports. 政府将对进口征税。

quiz.question: topsy-turvy ____
quiz.explanation: 颠倒的; 混乱的, 混乱的房间. The topsy-turvy room needed organizing. 混乱的房间需要整理。

quiz.question: ____ savvy
quiz.explanation: 精明; 懂行, 技术精通. She is very tech savvy. 她非常精通技术。

quiz.question: showy _______
quiz.explanation: 炫耀的; 华丽的, 炫耀的展示. The flowers made a showy display. 花朵形成了炫耀的展示。

quiz.question: billowy ______
quiz.explanation: 波浪起伏的; 翻腾的, 翻腾的云朵. Billowy clouds filled the sky. 翻腾的云朵充满天空。

quiz.question: willowy ______
quiz.explanation: 苗条的; 柳树般的, 苗条的身材. The model had a willowy figure. 模特有苗条的身材。

quiz.question: sleazy _____
quiz.explanation: 低劣的; 肮脏的, 肮脏的汽车旅馆. They stayed at a sleazy motel. 他们住在一家肮脏的汽车旅馆。

quiz.question: _ frenzy __ ______
quiz.explanation: 狂热; 疯狂, 购买狂潮. There was a frenzy of buying before the sale ended. 促销结束前出现了购买狂潮。

quiz.question: frowzy ____
quiz.explanation: 污秽的; 邋遢的, 污秽的房间. The frowzy room smelled terrible. 污秽的房间气味很糟。

quiz.question: muzzy ____
quiz.explanation: 头脑糊涂的; 模糊的, 糊涂的头脑. I woke up with a muzzy head. 我醒来时头脑糊涂。

quiz.question: ersatz _______
quiz.explanation: 代用的; 人造的, 人造皮革. The bag is made of ersatz leather. 这个包是用人造皮革制成的。
